statements: SELECT * FROM ar_performance_data
SELECT participant_id, performance_score FROM ar_performance_data WHERE challenge_id = 123 ORDER BY performance_date DESC
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, competition_id FROM ar_performance_data GROUP BY competition_id
SELECT * FROM ar_performance_data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_performances, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM ar_performance_data
SELECT * FROM ar_performance_data WHERE challenge_id = 1 AND participant_id = 10 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM ar_performance_data WHERE competition_id = 5 GROUP BY participant_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 8;
SELECT MAX(performance_score) AS max_score, MIN(performance_score) AS min_score FROM ar_performance_data WHERE challenge_id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_performances FROM ar_performance_data GROUP BY participant_id ORDER BY total_performances DESC, participant_id ASC;

SELECT competition_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM ar_performance_data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY competition_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 7;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_date FROM challenges WHERE challenge_type = 'programming';
SELECT challenge_name, winner_id FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_date DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type, winner_id FROM challenges WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT performance_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM performance_data ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_date FROM challenges WHERE challenge_type = 'Sprint' ORDER BY challenge_date DESC

SELECT challenge_name, winner_id, challenge_date FROM challenges JOIN performance_data ON challenges.challenge_id = performance_data.challenge_id WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY performance_score DESC

SELECT challenge_name, winner_id, challenge_date, performance_score FROM challenges JOIN performance_data ON challenges.challenge_id = performance_data.challenge_id WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY challenge_date ASC

SELECT challenge_name, winner_id, performance_score FROM challenges JOIN performance_data ON challenges.challenge_id = performance_data.challenge_id WHERE performance_date = '2022-10-15' AND performance_score < 80 ORDER BY winner_id

SELECT challenge_name, winner_id, performance_score FROM challenges JOIN performance_data ON challenges.challenge_id = performance_data.challenge_id WHERE challenge_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY challenge_name
SELECT * FROM performance_data;
SELECT performance_score, performance_date FROM performance_data ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_category FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions WHERE competition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM performance_data GROUP BY participant_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE challenge_id = 1 AND participant_id = 10;
SELECT challenge_id, participant_id, performance_score FROM performance_data WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_category, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE challenge_category = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY challenge_difficulty ASC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions WHERE competition_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.challenge_id, c.challenge_name, p.participant_id, p.performance_score FROM performance_data p JOIN challenges c ON p.challenge_id = c.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM AR_Challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type FROM AR_Challenges WHERE challenge_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_city FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_email, judge_specialty FROM Judges WHERE judge_specialty = 'AI';

SELECT participant_name, challenge_name, score FROM Participants JOIN Scores ON Participants.participant_id = Scores.participant_id JOIN AR_Challenges ON Participants.challenge_id = AR_Challenges.challenge_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type FROM AR_Challenges ORDER BY challenge_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_city, challenge_name FROM Participants INNER JOIN AR_Challenges ON Participants.challenge_id = AR_Challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT judge_name, judge_specialty FROM Judges WHERE judge_specialty = 'Artificial Intelligence';
SELECT participant_name, challenge_name, score FROM Participants INNER JOIN Scores ON Participants.participant_id = Scores.participant_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, competitor_email FROM competitors;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_category, challenge_start_date, challenge_end_date FROM challenges WHERE challenge_category = 'Fitness';
SELECT DISTINCT competitor_country FROM competitors;
SELECT award_title, award_category, award_date FROM awards ORDER BY award_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE competitor_country = 'USA';
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_email FROM competitors WHERE competitor_age > 30;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_start_date, challenge_end_date FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_start_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, performance_score FROM competitors JOIN performances ON competitors.competitor_id = performances.competitor_id WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT judge_name, award_title, award_date FROM judges JOIN awards ON judges.judge_id = awards.judge_id WHERE judge_country = 'UK';
